record.description: "Who’s Who" at the University of Chicago? Listed in the university's student directory are, left to right: Woodrow Wilson, John Gilbert, Carter Harrison, James Braddock, Joe Cannon, Jane Adams, Walter Johnson, Walter Eckersall, and Sam Adams; seated at the piano are Irving Berlin and Gertrude Laurence. In addition, there are a Faust, a Mendelssohn, two Bachs, a Robert Burns, and an Al Smith.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
